snippet: The new boss will need stature, technical knowledge and a desire to run the company in a time of turmoil, and will need to be comfortable operating under scrutiny.
abstract: Twitter may have difficulty finding suitable candidate to replace Dick Costolo as chief executive; all three previous chiefs have been pushed out against their will, and new candidate will face daunting challenges turning around company amid management chaos, anemic growth and skeptical investors; many on Wall Street speculate that role will eventually fall to company's chairman, co-founder and current interim chief Jack Dorsey.

byline.contributor: Nick Bilton contributed reporting from Los Angeles.

lead_paragraph: The new boss will need stature, technical knowledge and a desire to run the company in a time of turmoil, and will need to be comfortable operating under scrutiny.

headline.main: List of Requirements for Twitter’s Next Leader Runs Deep
headline.print_headline: A Long List of Wants at Twitter
